title: General Manager & Full Stack Web Developer
description: Leading technology solutions company as General Manager while actively developing full-stack web applications. Managing company operations, client relationships, and technical development projects.

Developing and maintaining multiple web applications including makalla.org, maqansa.com, makallacommunity.makalla.org, and yenechat.com
Leading development teams and managing project timelines
Building scalable web solutions for clients
Managing client relationships and business development
